meanings.definition: The quality or state of being flat.
meanings.sent1: The flatness of the paper made it easy to write on.
meanings.sent2: The table's flatness made it perfect for playing board games.
meanings.sent3: The painter joked that achieving perfect flatness on the canvas was harder than it looked.
meanings.sent4: The flatness of the desert stretched out endlessly under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The flatness of the pancake made it look like a perfect circle on the plate.

meanings.sent1: The flatness of the wall showed no bumps or dents.
meanings.sent2: The flatness of the music made it sound monotonous.
meanings.sent3: The flatness of the joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The flatness of the landscape made it seem like a never-ending plain.
meanings.sent5: The flatness of the color made the painting seem dull and lifeless.

meanings.sent1: The flatness of the table made it easy to stack books.
